page.title: 17Hadley Stadium (3)
page.content: { Hadley}stadium in{Waterloo Rd}is a modern{sports complex}offering international styled{facilities}for a wide range of{sports.}There is, in conjunction with an{all weather {omniturf pitch, a large indoor sports {complex offering basketball, {volleyball and badminton together with open activities and weight training rooms. There is a conventional grass area surrounded by{running track.}This grass area is used both as{football {pitch and athletics field events area. The running surface is of sufficiently high quality to have been used for televised athletics events. The{facility}is used throughout the day by{local schools}and in the evening by{local youth and adult {teams.}This facility offers a welcome focal point for the local community.
